name: Fliegenstad
description:
Fliegenstad is a mix of a visual novel and a point & click game. You are a detective in a steampunk setting where you'll be solving puzzles and interacting with the NPCs.

*Set storyline with minor variations and multiple endings

*Dialogue system, and relationship trackers that affect the story

*3 different puzzles

********************

Story

You're Isa Holst, a former police officer, now a detective in the lower levels of Fliegenstad, the flying city above the clouds. Your seemingly normal murder investigation escalates into a life-threatening situation when you discover something you shouldn't have.

Characters

Meet Aleid Heeren your former boss, a stern but just police chief. If you're up for a drink in a bar, go to Vulgar Unicorn and talk to its always smiling bartender, Gisela Eikenboom. You can also find Ferdi Fortuin in there, an occasional pool player and a full-time High Council worker.

Gameplay

Advance the story by reading further and picking the choices you wish. Give gifts to those you like, and disagree with those you hate. Use your mouse to find evidence, and solve puzzles which require you to use your wit. 

********************

Fliegenstad is a game project for school. It will not receive any updates or bug fixes after release. Consider it just a fun way to pass time :).
